summary: Completed regression testing of The Local Jewel Lead Generation Wizard after bug fixes. Backend APIs are fully functional (100% pass rate), but critical session persistence issues prevent completion of full wizard flows and comprehensive frontend testing.

critical_bugs.issue: Wizard sessions reset unexpectedly to landing screen during flow completion
critical_bugs.impact: Prevents users from completing full wizard flows, blocks lead submission

critical_bugs.issue: Auto-save may not be persisting wizard state correctly across page interactions
critical_bugs.impact: Users lose progress when navigating or refreshing pages

ui_bugs.issue: React hydration errors for span elements inside select/option tags
ui_bugs.symptoms: Console warnings about invalid HTML structure

passed_tests: Backend API health check (100% success rate)
Wizard initialization and product type selection
Tennis bracelet branching to multi-field form
Value reveal screen shows savings animation ($4,000-$8,000 range)
OTP login UI flow and rate limiting
Progress indicators display correct step numbers
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix session persistence issues in WizardContext that cause unexpected resets to landing screen. This prevents completion of wizard flows and lead submissions. Check auto-save debouncing, localStorage handling, and state restoration logic. Also investigate React hydration errors in select elements.
success_percentage: Backend: 100%, Frontend: 40% (critical session issues prevent full testing)
